name: Valley Of Wind
description:
Created by: Gunes Ustunalp, Emirhan Erdil. 

 Instructions: The aim is to connect with the rocks to strengthen the tree. press WASD to move the roots, press R to respawn at the origin point of the roots 

 In this game, we are controlling the roots of a tree that resists against the wind. Our goal is to hold on to the rocks to prevent our tree from flying away. We made in this project in the Godot Game Engine. This is the first jam, the first game we created with Godot and the first 2D game we created. We are quiet happy with how this project came to be. We didn't use any pre-made asset other than the wind sound.(We made all the art, animations and music ourselves)
